document_data.name: Meldonder Nurian
document_data.titles:
Lord of the Waves
Admiral of Melvaunt's Navy
document_data.mainbody: '''Meldonder Nurian''' served as "Lord of the Waves" in [[Melvaunt]] around [[1367 DR]] and [[1373]].
document_data.Description: Meldonder was an imposing young man who's hair had turned white prematurely.
document_data.Activities: As Lord of the Waves Meldonder was responsible for the welfare of Melvaunt's navy. In 1367 DR the navy consisted of twelve vessels with another four under construction.
